Class MyBot

  • java.lang.Object
    • becker.robots.Sim
      • becker.robots.Robot
        • becker.robots.RobotSE
          • MyBot
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    becker.robots.IColor, becker.robots.ILabel
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    NPC_Bot

    public class MyBot
extends becker.robots.RobotSE
    This class part of my Star trek adventure game the game is a very simple, text based adventure game with a graphical representation The game has been extended from "SoC World" to be made more interesting! The represents the robot controled by the player in the game
    Version:
    Final
    Author:
    UP730691

    • Constructor Detail

      • MyBot

        public MyBot(becker.robots.City theCity,
             int avenue,
             int street,
             becker.robots.Direction aDirection)
        Creates the robot
        Parameters:
        theCity - - The city in which the robot will exist.
        avenue - - The robot's initial avenue within the city.
        street - - The robot's initial street within the city.
        aDirection - - The robot's initial direction. One of {Direction.NORTH, EAST, SOUTH, WEST}.
